newsitem.title: SOUTH AFRICA: S.AFRICA TO HOST IOSCO MEETINGS IN MAY.
newsitem.headline: S.AFRICA TO HOST IOSCO MEETINGS IN MAY.

text.p: South Africa is to play host to meetings of the International Organisation of Securities Commissions (IOSCO), the country's Financial Services Board said on Thursday.
IOSCO has members from 75 countries and the meetings will provide a forum for discussing issues relating to the regulation of securities and derivatives markets and self-regulatory organisations.
IOSCO's emerging markets committee will hold a meeting in Johannesburg from May 26-28 and the Africa/Middle East regional committee will meet in the same city on May 29.
The technical commitee will meet on May 29-30 and the executive committee will meet on May 30-31. Both these meetings will take place in Cape Town.
